description: Hon. E. A. G. R. Amarasekara, J. - 1. Dawooduge Mohamed Abiyar 2...
parties: 1. Dawooduge Mohamed Abiyar 2. Dawooduge Sajahan 3. Dawooduge Mohamed Nizam. All Rambukkanthenne, Ridigama. PLAINTIFFS Vs. Haji Lebbai Mohamed Ismail alias Mohamed Lebbai of Wewagerara, Ridigama. DEFENDANT AND 1. Dawooduge Mohamed Abiyar 2. Dawooduge Sajahan 3. Dawooduge Mohamed Nizam. All Rambukkanthenne, Ridigama. PLAINTIFF–APPELLANTS Vs. Haji Lebbai Mohamed Ismail alias Mohamed Lebbai, of Wewagedare, Ridigama. DEFENDANT–RESPONDENT AND NOW. In the matter of an Application for Leave to Appeal in terms of section 5 (C) (1) of the High Court of the Provinces (Special Provisions) (Amendment) Act No. 54 of 2006 read together with Article 128 of the Constitution. Haji Lebbai Mohamed Ismail alias Mohamed Lebbai, of Wewagedara, Ridigama. DEFENDANT–RESPONDENT-PETITIONER. Vs. 1. Dawooduge Mohamed Abiyar 2. Dawooduge Sajahan 3. Dawooduge Mohamed Nizam. All Rambukkanthenne, Ridigama. PLAINTIFF-APPELLANT– RESPONDENTS.
judgement_by: Hon. E. A. G. R. Amarasekara, J.
